description:
I wanted to annotate my mosaic data (ref.6) with the M81 group members as listed in the Wikipedia article (ref. 1) and found extra information in a number of articles (ref. 2-5) that i used for a visual match with images made with large telescopes. This was not an easy task, but i could add/annotate 22 members ( of >33 in total). In image revision "Original" you can find a version also annotated with PGC catalog numbers.  The image needs to be viewed in full resolution (to be able to read the text and see the actual dwarf galaxies.......).


ref.1:"Wikipedia: The M81 group"
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M81_Group

ref. 2:"The M 81 group of galaxies: New distances, kinematics and structure" 
https://www.aanda.org/articles/aa/pdf/2002/07/aa1940.pdf

ref.3:"Dwarf spheroidal galaxies in the M81 group imaged with WFPC2"
https://pdfs.semanticscholar.org/1c03/a8a1da90a8e139743335d50b4a70408261a0.pdf

ref.4:"Discovery of new dwarf galaxies in the M81 group"
https://arxiv.org/pdf/0805.1250.pdf

ref.5:"New Hydrogen Clouds in the M81 Group of Galaxies"

ref.6:"Volcano and Angel, Mandel-Wilson 15 panel annotated version"
https://www.astrobin.com/389783/?nc=user

ref.7:"DD78 and it's Globular Cluster, members of the M81 group"
https://www.astrobin.com/gxkxed/?nc=user
title: Reference image: 22 members of the M81 galaxy Group
